frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-desk-changer
frozen.shortDescription: Simple wallpaper changer with multiple profile support. Integrates into the shell by providing it's own panel icon. The daemon is written using gjs and runs independently of the extension as a background process.
frozen.longDescription: Simple wallpaper changer with multiple profile support. Integrates into the shell by providing it's own panel icon. The daemon is written using gjs and runs independently of the extension as a background process.
